name: IacDiscordNotifs
description: Forward iACADEMY NEO LMS Notifications to a Discord Webhook.

GMAIL_USERNAME.description: The email of the specified account

GMAIL_PASSWORD.description: The password of the specified email

WEBHOOK_ID.description: The ID of the Discord webhook.

WEBHOOK_TOKEN.description: The token of the Discord webhook.

MESSAGE_TEXT.description: The content of the message that will be put alongside the embed.
